OOC: is Astroblast's base in USA?

Condor::

Condor heard the shot close to him, he guess that Triggerhappy liked 
to scare him, but he didn't give him that pleasure. When Astroblat 
grabbed his arm, Condor reluctant walked altought he would wish ran 
away but stay in a enemy base with several bot around him was enough 
reason to don't do it, it wasn't wise.

"I should wait a chance" tought COndor


--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> "Lets put the bot into the energon holding cells (prison) till we 
> return." (Astroblast is quite strong so escaping him would be very 
> dificult). He grabs Condors arm, and takes him down to the holding 
> base.
> 
> 
> On 23 Feb 2001, at 0:47, airly2000@y... wrote:
> 
> > COndor::
> > 
> > The pain that he felt was big... He was lost now!!! He only could 
> > trust that his friends would help him now... He didn't move and 
> > didn't speak. He only had to wait a chance to run away or wait 
for 
> > help.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> > > ::Triggerhappy::
> > > 
> > >        Triggerhappy yanks Condor out with him from the hatch, 
then 
> > puts him
> > > on the ground.  Blowpipe turns back into Triggerhappy's 
compressed 
> > air
> > > cannon.  He kicks Condor in the side, and points Blowpipe at 
Condor.
> > > 
> > >         "You make one move, you die!" He said.
> > > 
> > >          Triggerhappy was getting eager to start firing his 
guns at 
> > the
> > > enemy.  Of course, the 'GRID' option was even dandier.
